isometricviewv2

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • isometricviewv2.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    OVERVIEW: This class stores the various properties of a tile. These properties include location (x, y, z), look of the tile and whether or not it is a walkable tile (clipping.) There are also useful functions that operate on tiles or simply return information. The (x, y) instance variables will be useful in the future, if I continue developing this program after the project. For now, they are unused.

      Tile(int x, int y, int type, int height)
      REQUIRES: a "3D" location (x, y, height), and a number representing the look (or type) of the tile.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(int x,
            int y,
            int type,
            int height)
        REQUIRES: a "3D" location (x, y, height), and a number representing the look (or type) of the tile. EFFECTS: initializes the instance variables. Also sets tile to unclipped if the type appears in the integer array "UNCLIPPED_TILE_IDS".
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of this tile
        y - y coordinate of this tile
        type - the type of this tile
        height - the height level of this tile

    • Method Detail

      • changeTileType

        public void changeTileType(java.lang.Boolean increase)
        REQUIRES: a boolean value used as a switch for flow of execution EFFECTS: changes the value of the current tile's type. "increase" being set to true will increment the tile's type. Otherwise, the tile's type is decremented.
        Parameters:
        increase - increment tile type if true, and otherwise decrement it

      • changeTileHeight

        public void changeTileHeight(java.lang.Boolean increase)
        REQUIRES: a boolean value used as a switch for flow of execution EFFECTS: changes the value of the current tile's height. "increase" being set to true will increment the tile's height. Otherwise, the tile's type is decremented.
        Parameters:
        increase - increments tile height if true, and otherwise decrements it

      • getTileType

        public int getTileType()
        EFFECTS: returns the value of the type of this tile.
        Returns:
        the type of this tile
